title: No Clash in OCE? Am I missing something?
body:
I'm very confused. 

There is the "Clash trophy" slot in the profile section, but that's it. I have no idea how to find more info on this?

replies.body: there is literally 3 articles on the front page and the client about Clash and when its starting...

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=U0Hn1vuT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-17T02:58:18.244+0000)
>
> there is literally 3 articles on the front page and the client about Clash and when its starting...

Sorry! I posted this before the client had articles about it :)
OCE always gets the short straw my man so i wouldn't be surprised. {{item:3070}}
